hibernate-mapping.query: select new org.mifos.application.productdefinition.util.valueobjects.MasterObject(rau.recommendedAmntUnitId,lookupvalue.lookUpValue) from org.mifos.application.master.util.valueobjects.RecommendedAmntUnit rau,org.mifos.application.master.util.valueobjects.LookUpValueLocale lookupvalue where rau.lookUpId=lookupvalue.lookUpId and lookupvalue.localeId=:localeId
